review: I have enjoyed the product itself. What I did NOT like was being asked during set up if I wanted to try Amazon Prime for free for one month and then finding a $101 charge on my credit card. I was interested in trying the Prime free to see how I liked it in comparison to similar services. Thankfully I was able to end the membership and have my money returned. But this left a bad taste in my mouth and I most likely will go with one of the comparable services.
